pullRequest.title: Fix local maven build of presto-testng-services
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fix local maven build of presto-testng-services
Previously retrying could be only enabled via CONTINUOUS_INTEGRATION.
This commit restores ability to enable retrying via system properties.

commit.message:
Fix local maven build of presto-testng-services

Previously retrying could be only enabled via CONTINUOUS_INTEGRATION.
This commit restores ability to enable retrying via system properties.

nodes.bodyText: Preexisting, but this is wrong. when the sys propeerty is "false", we should not be enabled
printing but to 'null' suggests the value is "null", not null
